caption.p: Challenges study. Vaccinated animals were challenged with 10x LD50 mouse-adapted viruses. Mice were monitored daily for 14 days for body weight changes and their survival. Figures show ( i) the survival of vaccinated animals challenged with ( A) Cal09 (H1N1), ( B) Phi82 (H3N2), ( C) rVet (H5N1), or ( D) rSH (H7N9) viruses; and ( ii) body weight changes in the vaccinated animals challenged with ( E) Cal09, ( F) Phi82, ( G) rVet, or ( H) rSH viruses.
